import React, { useState } from 'react' import './portfolio.css' import Card from './Cards/card' import card1 from '../../image/card1.webp' import card2 from '../../image/card2.png' import { useEffect } from 'react' import AOS from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css' const Portfolio=()=> { const[state,setState] = useState(false) const handle=(e)=>{ setState(e) } useEffect(()=>{ AOS.init({duration:1000}) },[]) return (

Portfolio( )

{state ?
: null }
) } export default Portfolio
